text: PPT is the most common way for Chinese people to say powerpoint. It is not frequently referred to with Chinese characters.小刘：小王，你能帮我个忙吗？小王：什么忙？我看看自己能不能帮到你。小刘：你知道怎么在PPT里插入视频吗？下周的工作汇报，需要用到，可是我不会。小王：让我来看看吧！你先打开PPT，然后可以在这里，就是工具栏，看到有插入按钮。接下来，你点击插入视频或者音频，点击插入就可以。之后，在工具栏左边可以看到，选择是单击鼠标时还是立刻播放视频，根据需要选择就可以了。小刘：小王，你真是太聪明了！小王：哈哈，没有，没有。你要注意，需要把视频和PPT放在同一个文件夹里，否则无法播放。小刘：好的，谢谢你！小刘：Xiao Wang, can you do me a favor?小王：What favor? I’ll see if I am able to help you.小刘：Do you know how to insert a video into a Powerpoint presentation? I need to use it at next week’s work report but I don’t know how.小王：Let me have a look! First open Powerpoint, then right here on the toolbar there is an insert button. Next, select to insert either video or audio. Press insert. Then, on the left side of the toolbar you can select to either have the video immediately play or only play upon mouse-click. Choose what you need accordingly.小刘：Xiao Wang, you are so clever！小王：Haha, no, no. You need to pay attention and place the video and the presentation within the same folder or it will not be able to play.小刘：Ok, thanks very much!1 – 插入视频第一部分是什么？a. 在工具栏左边选择立刻插入视频b. 点击插入视频c. 打开PPTd. 关上PPT1. cReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
